about_the_game:
Welcome to Dogs Organized Neatly - Paper Edition

As the name suggests, this is a printable version of the video game Dogs Organized Neatly! The levels and dogs are exactly the same as in the base game, this is just another way to experience the game.

This could provide a nice way to get some off-screen time and focus on some meditative paper cutting, or gathering your kiddos around the table and getting the dogs nicely colored, before organizing them (neatly).

You will get a PDF file with the following content:

  • Game Rules
  • 80 levels, each on their own page
  • Two sets of dog sheets to print and cut:
    • Pre-colored like the in-game version
    • Blank, so you can recolor the dogs in any way you like!

We hope you'll enjoy this alternative way of playing the game as well - get creative and have fun! ♡♡

To find the pdf:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on Dogs Organized Neatly in your game list.
2. Select "Manage"
3. Click "Browse local files"
4. Open the folder Dogs Organized Neatly Paper Edition

Welcome to Dogs Organized Neatly - Paper Edition

As the name suggests, this is a printable version of the video game Dogs Organized Neatly! The levels and dogs are exactly the same as in the base game, this is just another way to experience the game.

This could provide a nice way to get some off-screen time and focus on some meditative paper cutting, or gathering your kiddos around the table and getting the dogs nicely colored, before organizing them (neatly).

You will get a PDF file with the following content:

  • Game Rules

    • Pre-colored like the in-game version

We hope you'll enjoy this alternative way of playing the game as well - get creative and have fun! ♡♡

To find the pdf:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on Dogs Organized Neatly in your game list.
2. Select "Manage"

4. Open the folder Dogs Organized Neatly Paper Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this printable paper version of Dogs Organized Neatly you can experience the digital game in an alternative way. Print out the dogs, cut out and color them, and enjoy the game!
